author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
It seems we are missing the update on dtSpecsFilter which happened in 2019 (see comment in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26535/files#r279754276). This leads to the crash we see in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36837#issuecomment-1046148021

I currently migrate only M10. This should be OK if we want to use D88 as a starting point of DD4hep migration. However, migration of M9 or older is fine for me. This is to discuss with Geometry expert.

FYI @slomeo @ianna @civanch @cvuosalo 

#### PR validation:
Local test of workflow 39634.911 with #37005 runs until the ends. We have a warning from HCAL to follow (but it does not stop the job)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Not a backport, and no need of backport
title: Fix dtSpecsFilter XML used by Phase-2 wf for DD4hep
